authmanageroauth-login: Button text for logging in with $1. Also tell the user to not fill out the login form (especially not the password field)
authmanageroauth-create: Button text for registering in with $1. Also tell the user to only fill out the username field (especially not the password field)
authmanageroauth-link: Button text for linking account with $1.
authmanageroauth-error: A generic OAuth error with $1 for the message.
